Hi, nice to meet you! I'm Jack Quach, a PhD student at [Dalhousie University](https://www.dal.ca/) and [Geriatric Medicine Research](https://www.dal.ca/sites/gmr.html). My doctoral research focuses on the applications of machine learning for aging, frailty, and health.
